includedAssets.title: Episode 1
includedAssets.synopsis: Ellie Miller, Alec Hardy and the town of Broadchurch find the events of series one still dominate their lives.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Ellie Miller, Alec Hardy and the town of Broadchurch find the events of series one still dominate their lives.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Ellie Miller, Alec Hardy and the town of Broadchurch find the events of series one still dominate their lives.
includedAssets.guidanceText: flashing images, strong language, mature themes, sex

includedAssets.title: Episode 2
includedAssets.synopsis: The people of Broadchurch struggle to come to terms with the devastating turn of events and shockwaves reverberate through the town.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: The people of Broadchurch struggle to come to terms with the devastating turn of events and shockwaves reverberate through the town.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: The people of Broadchurch struggle to come to terms with the devastating turn of events and shockwaves reverberate through the town.

includedAssets.title: Episode 3
includedAssets.synopsis: Hardy faces a race against time as Ellie discovers a startling new piece of evidence forcing them to reassess their suspicions.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Hardy faces a race against time as Ellie discovers a startling new piece of evidence forcing them to reassess their suspicions.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Hardy faces a race against time as Ellie discovers a startling new piece of evidence forcing them to reassess their suspicions.

includedAssets.title: Episode 4
includedAssets.synopsis: Family tensions resurface for Ellie and her sister, Mark Latimer has a decision to make and Alec Hardy has to face his demons.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Family tensions resurface for Ellie and her sister, Mark Latimer has a decision to make and Alec Hardy has to face his demons.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Family tensions resurface for Ellie and her sister, Mark Latimer has a decision to make and Alec Hardy has to face his demons.

includedAssets.title: Episode 5
includedAssets.synopsis: New information forces Hardy and Ellie to re-evaluate. Is it possible that they have been wrong about everything so far?
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: New information forces Hardy and Ellie to re-evaluate. Is it possible that they have been wrong about everything so far?
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: New information forces Hardy and Ellie to re-evaluate. Is it possible that they have been wrong about everything so far?

includedAssets.title: Episode 6
includedAssets.synopsis: Ellie tries to wrest back control, and time is running out for Alec Hardy. Meanwhile, Beth Latimer faces an emotional ordeal alone.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Ellie tries to wrest back control, and time is running out for Alec Hardy. Meanwhile, Beth Latimer faces an emotional ordeal alone.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Ellie tries to wrest back control, and time is running out for Alec Hardy. Meanwhile, Beth Latimer faces an emotional ordeal alone.

includedAssets.title: Episode 7
includedAssets.synopsis: A trap is set - but in a turn of events she could never have foreseen, Ellie finds herself exposed and alone.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: A trap is set - but in a turn of events she could never have foreseen, Ellie finds herself exposed and alone.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: A trap is set - but in a turn of events she could never have foreseen, Ellie finds herself exposed and alone.

includedAssets.title: Episode 8

includedAssets.title: Season 2
includedAssets.synopsis: DS Ellie Miller (Olivia Colman) and DI Alec Hardy (David Tennant) return for a second series of the BAFTA award-winning crime drama set in a Dorset seaside resort.

includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: DS Ellie Miller (Olivia Colman) and DI Alec Hardy (David Tennant) return for a second series of the BAFTA award-winning crime drama set in a Dorset seaside resort.

includedIn.title: Broadchurch
includedIn.synopsis: Two local detectives are called to investigate when the body of an 11-year-old boy is found on a beach in the seaside resort of Broadchurch.
